howItWorks.subtitle: How it Works
howItWorks.title: A simple and efficient workflow to bring your vision to life. From the first call to final delivery, every step is designed for clarity and efficiency.

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We start with a deep dive into your project goals, challenges, and requirements.

step2.title: Design
step2.description: We create a design that is tailored to your project goals, challenges, and requirements.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: We develop your project to the highest standards of quality and performance.

step4.title: Launch
step4.description: We launch your project to the world and help you maintain it.

step5.title: Maintenance
step5.description: We help you maintain your project and keep it running smoothly.

react.name: React
react.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

nextjs.name: Next.js
nextjs.description: Next.js is a React framework for building server-side rendered applications.

typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing.

javascript.name: JavaScript
javascript.description: JavaScript is a programming language that allows you to implement complex features on web pages.

html.name: HTML
html.description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

css.name: CSS
css.description: CSS is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with a keen eye for detail and a love for creating beautiful, user-friendly web experiences. With years of experience in modern web technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean code and intuitive design.

experience.title: My Experience
experience.description: I've worked on numerous projects ranging from small business websites to large-scale web applications. My expertise lies in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks. I'm constantly learning and staying up-to-date with the latest trends in web development.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating seamless user experiences. Every project is an opportunity to learn something new and push the boundaries of what's possible on the web. I focus on performance, accessibility, and responsive design in everything I build.

interests.title: Beyond Code
interests.description: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community. I'm passionate about continuous learning and believe that the best way to grow is by helping others grow too.

footer.cta: Book a call, and I'll take care of the rest
